sqlinfo.sqlname: 查询物资出库信息主表id，通过出库单号
sqlinfo.sql: SELECT id FROM jy_storehouse_out WHERE putout_code =$S{putout_code};

INSERT INTO jy_storehouse_out ( putout_code, putout_type, putout_user, putout_date, putout_storehouse_code, apply_user, putin_storehouse_code, status, remark, inputuser, crt_date, crt_time ) VALUES ( $S{putout_code}, $N{putout_type}, $N{putout_user}, $S{SYSDATE}, $S{putout_storehouse_code}, $N{apply_user}, $S{putin_storehouse_code}, $N{status}, $S{remark}, $N{sys_user_id}, $S{SYSDATE}, $S{SYSTIME} );
